lines.text: Observer in train sees person on track moving backwards
Measures ball velocity relative to train

secText:
Lesson:
1. A [OBJ:expsec_c388:reference frame] is used to measure motion from an observer’s perspective.
2. When one reference frame is moving relative to the other reference frame, each observer in their respective reference frames will observe [OBJ:expsec_c389:relative velocities] for objects.
3. When two objects are moving in an observer’s reference frame, the [OBJ:expsec_c390:velocities of both objects can be calculated relative to each other].
